item.title: 姆斯蒂斯拉夫-切尔诺夫（Mstyslav Chernov）拍摄的《马里乌波尔的 20 天》以第一人称的方式描述了 2022 年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰初期的惨痛经历，获得了奥斯卡最佳纪录片奖。这是美联社和公共广播公司的 "前线 "首次获得奥斯卡奖。
item.description:
Mstyslav Chernov’s “20 Days in Mariupol,” a harrowing first-person account of the early days of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine in 2022, won the Oscar for best documentary. It was the first Academy Award for the AP and PBS' "Frontline." https://t.co/mortECTej7

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.description:
Robert Downey Jr., Da'Vine Joy Randolph, Emma Stone and Cillian Murphy pose with their #Oscars at the 96th Academy Awards. https://t.co/4xe9ZoeRke pic.twitter.com/ERXNRUm9a8

item.title: 在克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）执导的传记大片《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）中，西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）扮演了原子弹制造者的角色，在登台领奖后，他称自己是一个 "非常自豪的爱尔兰人"。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy called himself a “very proud Irishman” after he trotted onstage to claim his first-ever Oscar for portraying the man who created the atomic bomb in Christopher Nolan’s blockbuster biopic “Oppenheimer.” https://t.co/4ndD494nSF

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024
